text: Šimunović () is a South Slavic surname. Notable people with the surname include: *Dinko Šimunović (b. 1873 - d. 1933), Croatian writer *Pjer Šimunović, (born 1962), Croatian Ambassador to the United States (2017 - present) *Jozo Šimunović (born 1994), Bosnian-Croatian footballer *Mario Simunovic (born 1989), Swedish footballer *Mato Šimunović (born 1985), Austrian footballer *Vladimir Simunović (born 1993), Serbian footballer Category:Bosnian-language surnames Category:Croatian-language surnames Category:Serbian-language surnames Category:Slavic-language surnames Category:Patronymic surnames
title: Šimunović
